overview: Ofer Raz Founder and Chief Technology Officer of GreenRoad Inc. Ofer Raz brings more than 15 years of technology experience to GreenRoad. He was a co-founder of 1CC, an Internet collaboration tool, and Tink Multimedia Productions, where his award-winning titles were distributed by Apple Inc., Electronic Arts, GT Interactive and Softkey. Ofer was also a key contributor in the early stages of Back-Web Technologies. Immediately before co-founding GreenRoad, he was director of product development for Relegence, a real-time data mining solutions company.
